page.title: 12A FAMOUS CUSTOM IN ALVA
page.content: An important{event}takes place each year in July. This is the famous{Alva {Highland Games,}which were held for the first time in 1856. The Alva Band leads a procession through the town to the Johnstone Park. Shows surround the playing field where all the events are held. There are lots of rides,like the waltzer and speedway,roundabouts,sideshows,space invaders and other fun things. In the arena highland dancing takes place with music played by the pipes. Sprint races,cycling,throwing the hammer,tossing the{caber}and throwing a weight over the high bar are all held here too. In 1982{Geoff Capes,} British Shot Putt Champion and Olympic competitor,took part in the Alva Games.
